name: Crowd-Island (Game Jam Version)
description:
Game Instructions:
Use W,A,S,D to move your characters and your mouse to create a link between them! A left-click from your mouse will create a link and a right-click will delete the links. Avoid the enemies, falling hazards, and cannonballs to reach the flag! There are 5 levels for now. Thanks for playing :)

This game was created and is under more development by gamez7 & sloth(me)! 
A big thank you to CraftPix, Pixel Frog, and RGS Dev for the art used in the game!
